revised_title: A Simple Method to Determine the Resistance of a Galvanometer-Coil Using Wheatstone's Bridge
tldr: The author presents a simple method to determine the resistance of a galvanometer-coil using Wheatstone's bridge, by interchanging the galvanometer and the galvanic element in the circuit. This method allows for a single deflection of the galvanometer's needle to obtain the desired measurement.
